page.title: 12CLUBS & EVENTS IN NENTHEAD
page.content: Most of the clubs in Nenthead hold their meetings in the Village Hall. These include badminton,youth club, ladies club,keep-fit.The hall is often used for irregular events such as jumble sales and discos. The Brownies hold meetings in a hut beside Wright's Garage.Cubs travel to Alston and join the Alston Pack.The Leek Club meets at the Miner's Arms. The Senior Citizens meet in the Over 60's Club which was formerly the Reading Room as does the W.I. The Rose Queen is held each June begining with a procession led by a float carrying the Rose Queen and her attendants followed by people in fancy dress and a brass band.Various stalls are set up in the Village Hall to raise money for the Village Hall funds.
